mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification_logs (guid, account_id, transaction_id, order_id, customer_id, message, type) VALUES (#{guid}, #{accountId}, #{transactionId}, #{orderId}, #{customerId}, #{message}, #{type})
mapper.select: SELECT id, guid, account_id as accountId, transaction_id as transactionId, order_id as orderId, customer_id as customerId, message, type, created_at as createdAt FROM notification_logs WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, guid, account_id as accountId, transaction_id as transactionId, order_id as orderId, customer_id as customerId, message, type, created_at as createdAt FROM notification_logs ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, guid, account_id as accountId, transaction_id as transactionId, order_id as orderId, customer_id as customerId, message, type, created_at as createdAt FROM notification_logs WHERE account_id = #{accountId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, guid, account_id as accountId, transaction_id as transactionId, order_id as orderId, customer_id as customerId, message, type, created_at as createdAt FROM notification_logs WHERE transaction_id = #{transactionId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, guid, account_id as accountId, transaction_id as transactionId, order_id as orderId, customer_id as customerId, message, type, created_at as createdAt FROM notification_logs WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
